Source.Name: bazel
Source.Summary: A fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system
Source.Description: Bazel is an open-source build and test tool similar to Make, Maven, and Gradle. It uses a human-readable, high-level build language. Bazel supports projects in multiple languages and builds outputs for multiple platforms. Bazel supports large codebases across multiple repositories, and large numbers of users.
